subjects.name: Background
subjects.description: These questions will ask general questions about your background that might be relevant to how people understand your career.

question.question: Who are you and what do you do?

subjects.name: Repeat After Me
subjects.description: These are miscellaneous phrases you'll be asked to repeat.

question.question: Please look at the camera for 30 seconds without speaking. Try to remain in the same position.
question.name: _IDLE_

question.question: Please give a short introduction of yourself, which includes your name, current job, and title.
question.name: _INTRO_

question.question: Please repeat the following: 'I couldn't understand the question. Try asking me something else.'
question.name: _OFF_TOPIC_
